ygData.subject: RE: FP helmets?
ygData.msgSnippet: yep, the gate guards drop them at least 80%...though if you aren t doing the killing yourself expect loot competition from scores of newbs looking for easy xp
ygData.messageBody:
yep, the gate guards drop them at least 80%...though if you aren't doing the
killing yourself expect loot competition from scores of newbs looking for
easy xp from a freeport quest that involves the helms...they wouldn't leave
us alone when i went for mine.

i have a near complete df suit. don't like the two-tone look at all. greaves
should match boots as a rule. i would rather have seen a 100% blood red
suit.

kg


>From: "Wilson, ThomasX B" <thomasx.b.wilson@...>
>Reply-To: shadowknight@onelist.com
>To: "'shadowknight@onelist.com'" <shadowknight@onelist.com>
>Subject: RE: [shadowknight] FP helmets?
>Date: Mon, 8 Nov 1999 09:11:49 -0800
>
>From what I've seen they drop from the Guards inside West and East FP
>fairly
>often (not sure if all the time since I've only killed 4 of them and in my
>case I got them all 4 times)..
>
>On a side note I did see my first full Dark Forge SK this weekend (a lvl 28
>I might add).. I'm still undecided on the looks, personally I think I like
>the Silver\Black look more still.
>
>
>
